DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the impact of praziquantel for the treatment of Schistosoma haematobium infection among schoolchildren in Al Salamania in Central Sudan.
DOC.detailed_description: A longitudinal study will be conducted to evaluate the impact of praziquantel for the treatment of Schistosoma haematobium infection among schoolchildren in Al Salamania in Central Sudan. A cohort of schoolchildren (6-15 years of age) was investigated before and 1 year after treatment with a single dose of praziquantel 40mg/kg.
